snippet.title: Undead Quest Gameplay Trailer 1.0
snippet.description:
PLAY Demo on SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/11858

After 9 months of development (it was like we were carrying a baby heh :)) we are happy to show you the gameplay trailer for the first half of our VR arcade game - Undead Quest.

We were working awfully hard with the graphics so that you can fully experience the beauty of virtual reality worlds. Check it out for yourself - watch the trailer (all captured on Meta Quest 2) and play the demo available on SideQuest and soon AppLab.

With the help of a bat, ball and a few spells, you’ll fight against hordes of funny undead creatures - skeletons, zombies, mummies and even a mad cow. If you want to leave your hard day behind to escape and have some fun - theeeen this is the game for you!

PLAY Demo on SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/11858
Share your feedback with us.
